ing: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAMÂ®), cubed
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (15 ounce) can sweet peas, with liquid
des: "Most people don't like SPAMÂ®, but I love it! Being Hawaiian, I eat it quite often and this is one way I've found that others can eat and enjoy it too! I serve this over brown rice and prefer to use frozen veggies, but cans make it quick and easy."
ins: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the luncheon meat, and cook until it browns along the edges, about 5 minutes. Pour in the corn and peas, and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer 5 to 10 minutes until the flavors are well incorporated, stirring occasionally.
